thread.title: Angelina Jolie Reveals How the Family Is Doing Following Her Divorce From Brad Pitt
thread.title_full: Angelina Jolie Reveals How the Family Is Doing Following Her Divorce From Brad Pitt

author: Zoe Jewell
title: Angelina Jolie Reveals How the Family Is Doing Following Her Divorce From Brad Pitt
text:
The mother of six also opened up about Donald Trump's travel ban and how she feels about the potential of turning away refugees. 
"Who are we? We are people, as Americans, who represent something to the world," she said. "We have to understand who these people are that we are speaking of and we have to remain tolerant, open, and base our policy on facts." Embed from Getty Images 
The Tomb Raider star first spoke publically about the divorce on BBC World News over the weekend and got emotional when asked how sheâ€™s handling the split. 
"I don't want to say very much about that, except to say it was a very difficult time," she revealed. Credit: BBC 
"We are a family and we will always be a family, and we will get through this time and hopefully be a stronger family for it." 
What are your thoughts on Angie's new interview? Sound off below!
